sense.def:
Long
pomeni veliko časa ali za veliko časa.

seg.quote: I haven't known her long.
Sorry it took so long.
Our oil won't last much longer.
I had guessed long ago.

T.def: Izraz uporabljamo v vprašanjih in trditvah o trajanju.

seg.quote: ‘How long have you been married?’—‘Five years.’
His speeches are never less than two hours long.

sense.def:
Dogodek ali obdobje, ki je
long
, traja dolgo ali vzame veliko časa.

seg.quote: There was a long pause.
They are demanding longer holidays.

sense.def:
Kar je
long
, od enega konca do drugega meri veliko.

seg.quote: She had long dark hair.
...a long line of cars.
...long tables.
We drove a long way the next day.

T.def: Izraz uporabljamo v vprašanjih in trditvah o fizični dolžini.

seg.quote: How long is that side?
...an area 3,000 feet long and 900 feet wide.

sense.def:
Knjiga ali besedilo, ki je
long
, vsebuje veliko besed.

seg.quote: ...an enormously long novel.

sense.def:
To long for something
pomeni močno si nekaj želeti.

seg.quote: They longed for green trees and open spaces.
They're longing to see you.

sense.def:
For long
pomeni za veliko količino časa.

seg.quote: Men have been indoctrinated for too long.
It didn't stay there for long.

sense.def:
Izraz
long
uporabljamo z
all
in
whole
, kadar želimo poudariti, da se nekaj, o čemer govorimo, dogaja ves čas.

seg.quote: We row all day long.
They play the whole day long.

sense.def:
Kadar nekaj
no longer happens
, se je dogajalo v preteklosti, zdaj pa se ne dogaja več.

seg.quote: We can no longer afford to live there.
I couldn't stand it any longer.

sense.def:
Before long
ima enak pomen kot
soon
.

seg.quote: They're bound to catch him before long.

sense.def:
Kadar je ena stvar resnična
as long as
ali
so long as another thing is true
, je resnična samo, če je resnična tudi druga stvar.

seg.quote: We were all right as long as we kept our heads down.

sense.def:
Izraz
so long
ima enak pomen kot
goodbye
;
